title.value: Тенденции, проблемы и перспективы развития молочной отрасли Беларуси
Tendencies, problems and prospects of Belarusian dairy branch development
Tendencies, problems and prospects of Belarusian dairy branch development

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Polivko, V.A., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: Now the problem of maintenance of the population of any country a qualitative and accessible foodstuff is rather actual and appreciably defines state economic policy. In this connection the important place is taken away to manufacture and milk processing where it is necessary to investigate and define more perfect approaches to increase of economic efficiency of dairy branch, to consider productive and economic mutual relations between the branch enterprises. In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus it was stated that for the effective provision of competitiveness of the production at external and internal markets it is necessary to realize a complex of measures on modernization of the production structure, extension of specialization and concentration of power capacities on dairy raw materials processing, increasing of its and ready products quality.
